channel.title: Running client!
channel.description:
If I try to run client it says: java' is not recognized as an internet or external command, operable program or batch file.
And run->edit: @echo off title RsMarket 525 Client cd src java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1
Im 64 bit, windows 7

item.title: Running client!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

@echo off title RsMarket 525 Client cd src "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1

Read full topic

item.title: Running client!
item.dc:creator: @djmeadows88 djmeadows88
item.description:
@djmeadows88 wrote:

Rix boy, please make sure that java is installed in your C:/ drive, if it is not then right there is the answer. It looks like you might have to put your location of your java as shown below @echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit

could have to add the exit aswell or your Xmx256m might not be valid for your computer, those are just problems ive ran into that did this error

Read full topic
